name: Kintsugi (elootam)
description:
Kintsugi

 Kintsugi is a little game made during the 2020 Game Jam. I havve done it during my first year of game development studies.

The game was made in only 10 hours  due to a problem that made us start another project.

Controls

LMB : Interactions.

Arrow keys : you will have to use them at a certain moment.

Team

Game Design / Prog :  Boulanger Thomas.
